data.message:
I'm sorry Em i didn't wish you on your birthday as i almost forgot. I'm sorry.
I know that you don't know if i even exist but to me you are my world man , not a single day passes without listening to your song , no matter what the consequences or condition you are always there for me to help me 'n get me through the bullshit that i deal with , 
you never fail to amuse me 'n give me goosebumps.
I hope you had a great birthday. 
Stay strong man cuz that's what you have taught up since the begining 'n i can't let you give up on up as we are not giving up on you . 
Happy Birthday Marshall :D
Love , Always <3
